m_szDocTitle: Japan has more charging stations than gas stations, sort of | Digital Trends
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Stay current with a recap of today's Tech News from DT. The all-electric automotive future is fast approaching, and Japan is leading the way. The Japan Times reports that the country now has more electric vehicle charging stations than gas stations. This fact comes from Nissan, which said that there are now 40,000 fast-charging stations around the island nation. This outpaces the country’s 34,000 gas stations by a good margin. It should be noted that this figure includes charging stations both on the streets and in homes. Related: First Impressions: 2017 Chevro
